description:
Welcome to my UDEMY Xcode Swift course! by the end of this course you will be able to build your first Apple Iphone App using multiple Tableview cells!

During the course you will learn how to import images, link pages, add small amount of basic code and submit your app to the app store.

The course is perfect for any first time app developer or someone who is simply interested in extending their knowledge in building table view applications,

Get you tick list ready! by the end of this course you will be able to

- Download Xcode

- Negotiate your way around the apple developer website

- Design a basic Mobile application

- Import images into Xcode

- Create a basic mobile App

- Link pages within the app

- Submit your App to the app store,

If this sounds like the course for you, welcome! this is the start of you new Xcode developer experience!
title: Build an Apple Iphone APP using Xcode Swift!
